title: Art Deco Heritage Stay in Downtown Boston with Daily Breakfast
description: Stay in one of Boston’s most beloved hotels at Boston Park Plaza: a grande dame hotel bedecked in Art Deco splendour that nods to her 1920s roots, with a Back Bay location that puts the best of Downtown Boston at your doorstep. Restored through an impressive 100-million-dollar refurbishment, this heritage hotel invites you to step into 1927 grandeur and discover a 90-year legacy, just moments from Boston Public Garden, the cobblestoned Newbury Street, historic Freedom Trail and Boston Common - the United States’ oldest park.
offer_address: 50 Park Plaza, Boston, MA 02116, United States

title: Contemporary Central Boston Stay near Charles River with Daily Breakfast & Parking
description:
Elevate your Boston escape with a stay at this central gem, where modern luxury meets sleek mid-century style. Designed to reflect the surrounding neighbourhood’s historic tree-lined streets and parks, Arcadian Hotel puts you right in the action - with rooms overlooking historic Beacon or St. Paul Street, a cutting-edge fitness centre and Bar 1200, your go-to for expertly crafted cocktails.

Step outside and dive into Boston’s buzzing arts scene, with top galleries, theatres and cultural landmarks just moments away. Iconic highlights - including Fenway Park, the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum and the Boston Symphony Orchestra - are all within a 10-minute drive. Harvard University is also just a short trip across the river, making it easy to explore one of the world’s most prestigious campuses.
offer_address: 1200 Beacon Street, Brookline, Massachusetts 02446, United States

title: Idyllic Boston Back Bay Escape with Daily US$75 Dining Credit & Onsite Rooftop Restaurant
description:
Experience the epitome of Bostonian elegance at The Newbury Boston, a landmark hotel located in the city's historic Back Bay. From this central location, stroll through the beautiful Public Gardens and along the cobblestoned road of Newbury Street, where you’ll pass quaint boutiques and cafes, continue to Boston Common, the USA’s oldest official public park (established in 1634), and catch a performance in the nearby theatre district.

Return to find an elegant balance between the hotel’s roaring 1920s roots and modernised first-class facilities, which include the hotel's rooftop restaurant, Contessa, offering panoramic city views and Italian-inspired dishes, a Jay Wright-designed fitness centre and sultry cocktail lounge.

title: Idyllic Boston Bay Back Escape with Daily US$75 Dining Credit & Onsite Rooftop Restaurant
description:
Experience the epitome of Bostonian elegance at The Newbury Boston, a landmark hotel located in the city's historic Back Bay. From this central location, stroll through the beautiful Public Gardens and along the cobblestoned road of Newbury Street, where you’ll pass quaint boutiques and cafes, continue to Boston Common, the United States’ oldest park (established in 1634), and catch a performance at the Theatre District.

Return to find an elegant balance between the hotel’s roaring 1920s roots and modernised first-class facilities, which include the hotel's rooftop restaurant, Contessa, offering panoramic city views and Italian-inspired dishes, a Jay Wright-designed fitness centre and sultry cocktail lounge.

title: Modern Waterfront Escape on Boston Harbour with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience Boston's historic charm with a stay at InterContinental Boston, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned on the city's waterfront, this modern glass tower offers breathtaking views of Boston Harbour. Venture out to explore the nearby Freedom Trail, a 2.5-mile long path through the city that passes 16 locations significant to the history of the United States. After a day of sightseeing, dine at Miel Brasserie for French cuisine with an American flair or grab an outdoor cocktail and light bites while taking in city views at 510 on the Waterfront.
offer_address: 510 Atlantic Avenue, Boston, Massachusetts 02210, United States

title: Refined Boston Opulence in Back Bay with Chic Cocktail Bars, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Find yourself in the heart of Boston’s elegant Back Bay, where timeless luxury meets contemporary design at this stately urban retreat. Thoughtfully appointed rooms and suites offer sweeping skyline views, marble bathrooms and the signature Raffles butler service. Take a relaxing dip in the hotel's indoor pool, pamper yourself at the luxurious Guerlain Spa and maintain your wellness routine at the fitness centre.

When hunger strikes, savour Mediterranean delights at Amar or indulge in Italian classics at La Padrona. For classic cocktails and intimate evenings, head to the moody Blind Duck speakeasy or enjoy the cityscape from the Long Bar & Terrace. With Newbury Street, Copley Square and the Esplanade all within easy reach, this polished address is a stylish launchpad for soaking up Boston’s best.

vendor_name: Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston
title: Vibrant Heritage Stay in South End Boston
description:
Discover bustling markets, storied sporting grounds, renowned restaurants and revolutionary history from the heart of Boston's charming 'Southie' or "SoBo' neighbourhood with a stay at the Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston. This boutique, art-inspired property is an easy walk from iconic landmarks including the Freedom Trail, Boston Common, Chinatown and Newbury Street.

The whimsical Staypineapple Hotels are built as 'celebrations of the living arts'. The lobby and guest rooms are dotted with beautiful abstract pieces and decorative tiling, with Staypineapple's signature yellow accents and pineapple logo making a frequent appearance. The chic Trophy Room restaurant and bar is an understated tribute to the city's sporting prowess and the perfect place to enjoy Sunday brunch or evening cocktails. Combining South Bostonian charm and vibrance with modern chic, thoughtful features and gracious service, all wrapped in the stylish package of a historic building, the Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston is your inner-city sanctuary.
location_description: Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston
offer_address: 26 Chandler St, Boston, MA 02116, United States

title: Five-Star Boutique Stay in the Heart of Boston's Historic Beacon Hill Neighbourhood
description: Ensconced within the gaslit streets of Boston’s historic Beacon Hill district is the five-star boutique XV Beacon hotel, offering meticulous service and fashionable luxury in the heart of the city. Inhabiting a turn-of-the-century Beaux-Arts building and featuring a midnight-black, gilded exterior, the hotel is an architectural jewel, indicative of the immaculate attention to detail expressed everywhere within. Its inimitable character is set apart by a breathtaking, world-class gallery - featuring abstractionist masterpieces, haunting portraits and an ancient Roman mosaic - and the decidedly unique Mooo…. restaurant, a modern steakhouse boasting the finest A5 Wagyu and a dazzlingly extensive wine list.
offer_address: 15 Beacon St, Boston, MA 02108, United States

title: Five-Star Boston Heritage Stay with Award-Winning Spa & Ramsay’s Kitchen
description: Classic elegance and chic modern furnishings combine to create the luxurious five-star Mandarin Oriental, Boston, featuring the first Forbes-awarded, five-star spa in Boston, along with a culinary experience designed by Chef Gordon Ramsay himself. Ideally positioned in the heart of Back Bay, this opulent hotel is within moments of the city’s shopping and business districts, allowing you to immerse yourself in Boston’s vibrant and bustling culture. Luxuriate in ornate suites overlooking the dazzling city lights and pamper yourself in the exclusive spa before heading down to taste exquisite twists on local classics at Ramsay’s Kitchen.
offer_address: 776 Boylston Street, Boston, Massachusetts 02199, United States

title: Heritage Downtown Boston Elegance with Daily Breakfast
description:
Stay in one of Boston’s finest hotels at the historic Boston Park Plaza, a landmark property reimagined after a US$100million renovation. Since it first opened in 1927, Boston Park Plaza has become deeply woven into the city’s heritage as one of its most sought-after hotels, with a prime downtown location within walking distance of Boston Public Garden, the theatre district and waterfront.

From the grand lobby with its marble floors and gilded accents to the traditional wooden panelling of M.J. O’Connor’s pub, this beautiful hotel offers elegance at every turn. Treat yourself to farm-to-table fare at Off The Common or while away an evening at Strega Italiano, where homemade pasta, seafood, steaks and cocktails are the perfect remedy when you’ve worked up an appetite exploring. Want to work it all off? Test your skills at Topgolf Swing Suite or work out at Lynx Fitness Club.
offer_address: 50 Park Plaza, Boston, MA 02116, United States

title: Heritage Boston Landmark Stay neat Fenway Park with Popular Restaurant & Rooftop Health Club
description:
Experience Boston's rich history and vibrant culture with a stay at the Fairmont Copley Plaza, majestically located in the heart of the city's historic Back Bay.  Just steps away, you'll find the renowned shops of Newbury Street, the charming Boston Public Library, and the bustling Copley Square Farmers Market.

When you're not exploring the city, dine at OAK Long Bar + Kitchen, the hotel's farm-to-table American brasserie, or enjoy a drink in the stylish lounge. Fitness enthusiasts can keep up their routine at the hotel's state-of-the-art rooftop health club, overlooking the surrounding neighbourhood.
offer_address: 138 St James Avenue, Boston, Massachusetts, United States of America, 02116

title: Historic Boston City Break in Glamorous Cambridge with Stylish ArtBar
description:
Discover bustling markets, storied sporting grounds, renowned restaurants and revolutionary history from the heart of one of Boston's most charming neighbourhoods, Cambridge, with a stay at Royal Sonesta Boston. Contemporary art meets modern style at this stylish hotel which is situated along the picturesque Charles River and showcases breathtaking city views.

Royal Sonesta Boston has all the amenities to make your trip memorable. Wake up to daily breakfast and a steaming hot mug of coffee and house-made pastry at Studio Café & Bakery, and unwind after busy days with a dip in the glistening pool or adventure to the fitness centre for a quick workout. End your day in bustling Boston at the ArtBar which combines original art from contemporary artists with quirky cocktails and artfully presented food.
offer_address: 40 Edwin H Land Blvd, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, United States

title: Bold Boston Escape Next to Fenway Park with Three Restaurants
description: Experience the epitome of luxury at the stylish Hotel Commonwealth, nestled in the heart of Boston's vibrant Kenmore Square. This warm and welcoming stay is your gateway to Fenway Park, the world-renowned Boston University and the city's eclectic dining scene. Unwind in sumptuously appointed rooms, savour fresh seafood delights at the Pescador Coastal Grill and delicate Japanese bites at Blue Ribbon Sushi and unwind while pumping some iron in the hotel's fully-equipped gym.
offer_address: 500 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, MA 02215, United States
